text: == Events == * January 31 – Athanasius of Alexandria returns from his fifth exile. * April – Emperor Valens defeats the troops of Procopius in the Battle of Thyatira. * Valens builds a pontoon bridge across the Danube. This lets the Visigoths travel farther north. * The Tabula Peutingeriana, a map showing Roman places and roads, is made about this time. * October 1 – Damasus I becomes 37th pope. == Births == * Yao Xing, emperor of the Chinese Qiang state Later Qin == Deaths == * Acacius of Caesarea, bishop and Christian leader of Arianism * September 24 – Pope Liberius * Marcellus, general and Roman usurper * May 27 – Procopius, Roman usurper * Yu Daolian, empress and wife of Jin Feidi * Zhi Dun, Chinese Buddhist monk and philosopher
